title: Risk rises in Country A, currency will depreciate

content.question: If foreign financial investors no longer see country A as a safe haven, which of the following will most likely occur in the short run?

choices.label: Country A’s current account will move toward deficit.
Country A’s financial account will move toward surplus.
Tariff revenues received by country A will decrease as investors seek investment elsewhere.
